data.title: Hydrophobic Paint Protection Film
data.meta_description: Hydrophobic and self-healing paint protection film in gloss and matte. PPF in glitter, colored, and patterned finishes. Ceramic Window Tint. Find an Installer!
data.meta_site_name: STEK USA | Hydrophobic Self Healing Paint Protection Film
data.text:
STEK Automotive Films

STEK is revolutionizing the Protective Automotive Flim industry by producing highly advanced film technologies designed to protect your vehicles and enhance your driving experience. Focused on quality and leading innovation, we offer paint protection films with hydrophobic and self-healing properties that boast extreme clarity and depth in a variety of finishes, colors, and patterns. STEK also covers your interior with our range of carbon and ceramic window tints that protect against UV damage and reject various levels of IR heat, keeping you and your passengers comfortable and protected on the inside too.

STEK offers a film for each driverâ€™s style to keep your vehicle a beautifully protected staple of your personality. PPF is a smart choice for new cars and restored classic cars, and with STEK, you can customize your car at the same time.

Browse our clear bra paint protection films, fashion films, and window tint films, and then find an installer near you today to get world-class protection installed on your car, truck, SUV, and other toys. Now supporting the United States, Canada, and Mexico.

Follow us on social to see current projects and gain inspiration for yours!
